show_name: Azumanga Daioh - The Very Short Movie
other_title: あずまんが大王（劇場短編） (Japanese)
plot: In this short movie featuring familiar characters from Azumanga Daioh, Osaka is yet again having a strange dream of Chiyo-Chan's pigtails being posessed. As Chiyo-Chan's pigtails bounce out of the window, who knows if young Chiyo will ever be happy again.
